mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department_* (id, department_name, depart_no, remark, sort_no, status, pid, leader, username, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, is_del) VALUES(#{department.id}, #{department.departmentName}, #{department.departmentNo}, #{department.remark}, #{department.sortNo}, #{department.status}, #{department.pid}, #{department.leader}, #{department.username}, #{department.createUser}, #{department.updateUser},#{department.createTime}, #{department.updateTime}, #{department.isDel});
mapper.select:
select * from department_*
and department_name like concat('%', #{departmentName}, '%')
and status = #{status}
and is_del = 0
order by create_time desc
select * from department_* where is_del = 0 order by create_time desc
select dept_id as deptId, pu.id, username, pu.phone from user_department_* ud join public_user pu on ud.user_id = pu.id
